title: Deal Days Savings: Get this Intel-powered refurbished MacBook Pro for under $260 through October 15th!
content:
Macworld

According to RTINGS, MacBooks are “consistently among the most well-built and premium laptops.” Fortunately, you don’t need to shell out an arm and a leg to score Apple’s top-rated laptop.

During Deal Days, our version of Prime Day, you can score a refurbished MacBook Pro for only $259.97 (reg. $536) with no coupon necessary.

This 2012 model-year MacBook Pro features an Intel Core i5 with 500GB HDD and 8GB of RAM. The HD display features 13.3″ of real estate to work with, and its 720p FaceTime camera can ensure you look crisp during work video calls. Plus, this laptop only weighs 4.5 pounds, making it easy to bring while traveling.

Each MacBook Pro has been reviewed by trained inspectors at both the hardware and software levels to verify quality, and a 30-day aftermarket warranty from a third party backs this device. This pre-owned MacBook Pro has a Grade B rating, meaning you may find some minor cosmetic marks on its exterior, but its performance shouldn’t be impacted.

Streamline your workflow with Apple’s popular laptop.

Grab this refurbished 13.3″ MacBook Pro with Intel Core i5 for just $259.97. No coupon is necessary, but this price drop ends October 15 at 11:59pm Pacific!

 

Apple MacBook Pro 13″ (2012) Core i5, 8GB RAM 500GB HDD (Refurbished)

Only $259.97 through Macworld

Prices subject to change.

Laptops
